title: T-REA Filings at SEC/Edgar
text:
Yogi,

Do you have a strong sense of who the target audience (audiences) is (are)?

The expense ratio may continue to discourage retirement programs, so is the ESG appeal to institutional investors, endowments, etc? Except there's that $150K limitation (even if work-arounds exist for retirement programs). Besides, institutions and endowments target higher returns than TREA provides.

I know ESG is a hot area, but I see too many obstacles in the prospectus that would limit TREA's general appeal.

Bob
